skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 1 turn.
Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of stealing 1 random buff from each enemy. After stealing, applies a [Buff Spread] effect, taking a random buff from this Champion and placing it on all allies.

Can target dead or living enemies.
If the target is dead, places a [Block Revive] on them, then attacks all enemies. Each enemy will receive damage equal to 20% of the target enemy’s MAX HP. If the target is a Boss’ minion, the damage is equal to 20% of this Champion’s MAX HP. This attack cannot be critical and will ignore any [Shield] buffs and 100% of each target’s DEF.
If the target is alive, places a [True Fear] debuff on them for 2 turns and heals all allies by 20% of the target enemy’s MAX HP. If the target is a Boss or a Boss’ minion, the healing is equal to 20% of this champion’s MAX HP. The [True Fear] debuff cannot be resisted.
Revives 1 random ally with 30% HP and 30% Turn Meter each time an enemy is killed.
